description: A step to extract the limit, offset, fields and filters from the params object.
label: Disect Params

options.name: fields
options.label: Fields as
options.info: Returns a Key-Value pair of the fields that are requested by the front-end.

options.name: filters
options.label: Filters as
options.info: Returns a Key-Value pair of the filters.

options.name: offset
options.label: Offset as
options.info: Returns the amount of records that need to be skipped.

options.name: limit
options.label: Limit as
options.info: Returns the amount of records that need to be shown.
